title: Chrissy Teigen tried to find dirt on John Legend when they first met
text:
Couple goals (Picture: David Buchan/Variety/REX/Shutterstock)

Chrissy Teigen scoured through every gossip blog to find dirt on John Legend when the stars first started dating.

The 33-year-old wanted to find out if rumours about the singer were true, and spent a lot of time looking for scandals.

During an interview for the December issue of Vanity Fair, Chrissy said: ‘He was kind of known at the time for either being in the closet or a modelizer.

‘I used to go on the websites and it was always either how I was his beard, or how he paid his past serious girlfriends, or how he was with some new model.

‘Oh my god, I would read everything.’

Thankfully – either because Chrissy wasn’t very good at sleuthing or because John is just an angel – she didn’t find anything.

The Green Light singer said: ‘It got serious pretty quickly. She just entertained the hell out of me, texting me.

Any of the rumours true, Chrissy? (Picture: VALERIE MACON/AFP/Getty Images)

‘What people respond to in her tweets today was the same energy in those texts. I didn’t know that I wanted someone funny until I was actually with someone funny.’

How do you not know if you want the hilarity that is Chrissy in your life?

John and Chrissy met on set of the singer’s 2007 music video for his single Stereo where she was cast as a bikini model.

This must have been the point the TV personality started thinking John was a modelizer.

They began seeing each other whenever John was in town (Miami) to perform.

At that point, Chrissy was a model struggling to find jobs.

‘I had no credit cards, I didn’t have a bank account, and it just didn’t occur to me to ask my dad for money,’ the mum-of-two said. ‘I knew exactly how it was with tax to get a McDouble and fries.’

But did you know how much a Chicken Legend was, Chrissy? Sorry, not sorry.

The couple got married in 2013 and have also welcomed the adorable Luna Simone, 3, and son Miles Theodore, 17 months, into their lives.
